msContents.summary: Official letter addressed to Aurelius Philoxenus, strategos of the Oxyrhynchite nome concerning arrears of wheat

msItemStruct.note: Written along the fibers; back blank
The hand is an upright, compact cursive

div.ab: Antonius(?) Philoxenos to the strategos of the Oxyrhynchite, greetings. . . . concerning the wheat that is owed . . . of the current records of the produce by the individual account of the procurator [l. 5] . . . Consider accordingly to . . . of defined by Marcellus . . . . drachmas for each artaba . . . 4 without delay . . . having paid in silver [l. 10] . . . to Ploutarchos dekadarchos . . . attendant of the procurator . . . in the most illustrious city of the Oxyrhynchites and . . . which will be deposited to the accounts of the procurator. I pray you be well. [l. 15] The . . . year of Iulii Philippi the Lords, Thoth the 10th.

listBibl.bibl: P.Princ. II 22 P. J. Sijpesteijn, "Corrections on Some Princeton Papyri," ZPE 68 (1987): 143-148; BL IX, 218
